events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team will review your qualifications and get back to you soon.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department as per your skills and experience related to software development.
A recruiter has been assigned to your application and will contact you shortly to discuss the next steps in the hiring process.
The initial screening interview for the Software Engineer role went well, and we are excited to move forward with technical evaluation.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming availability for the technical interview scheduled next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 2 PM UTC. Please prepare accordingly and let us know if you need assistance.
You have successfully completed the technical interview with great feedback on your engineering skills and problem-solving abilities.
The HR interview is scheduled for May 25th at 10 AM UTC. This will cover company culture, benefits, and other employment details.
Your HR interview went smoothly. The team appreciated your communication skills and cultural fit for the organization.
We are pleased to extend an official offer for the Software Engineer position. Please review the details and let us know your decision.
Thank you for your positive feedback regarding the offer. We are glad the terms meet your expectations and look forward to your response.
You have accepted the offer. Welcome aboard! We are excited to have you join our engineering team and contribute to our projects.
The onboarding process has started. You will receive access to all necessary tools and documentation to help you get started smoothly.
The hiring process is now closed successfully. We are thrilled to officially welcome you to our engineering department and team.
